alert.note: Alert for Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washington, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and northern Tyrrell Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roper, or 11 miles east of Plymouth, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alligator, Columbia, Woodley, Wenona, Newfoundland, Westover, Pleasant Grove, Scuppernong, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Mackeys, Roper, Creswell and Stevenson Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
